head.title: GStreamer Google Summer of Code: Java

body.h1: GStreamer Google Summer of Code: Java

p.quot: GStreamer Java bindings rewrite, JNI based bindings that work better in Android than Java-GNOME.

body.p: There is a minimal bindings generator available here: https://github.com/EricssonResearch/openwebrtc/tree/master/bindings/java
The solution needs to be JNI based because Android does not support JNA. This means using the GNOME Java bindings solution won't work for developers using GStreamer on Android.
